attributes.action: leave us areas to smoke in publick or we will stop buying cigerates -
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And if we stop buying cigerettes where are you going to get all that lovely tax money from?  who will fund the NHS ? what will you do with tobaco companies when they have to fire ALL there employees and there millionare owners stop giving hand outs to the private sector ?
